content: bor ssk repeat decrease rounds until you have worked 3 decrease rounds total after the third decrease round you should have 11 stitches on your needles continue knitting in stockinette for 6 more rounds or until the sleeve measures ~8 5 cm from the underarm decrease 1 stitch by k2tog you should now have 10 stitches remaining switch to 3 mm needles knit one round then work k1p1 ribbing until the sleeve measures 10cm total length from the underarm bind off loosely using italian bind-off or your preferred method repeat for the second sleeve 04 finishing weave in all ends sew up small holes at the underarm if needed wet block and shape to measurements
